notes.body: Hello ​Radha,     Greetings from PharmEasy!  ​   I understand your concern related to the order #654763459244195840-56111. Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience caused.  ​   However, we can take a returned request for the same.  ​   Before raising a returned request, I would request you set the refund preference so that the refund is initiated into the payment source or else the refund will be credited to your PharmEasy wallet.   ​  You can set refund preferences in your App or on the website based on the Mode of Payment that you select for your orders.  ​  Click on the link to set the refund preference:  https://pharmeasy.in/account/profile/refunds     Once you set the refund preference, you can connect back to us and we will take action accordingly.  ​  Awaiting your response.  ​  Regards,  Manisha
notes.body_html:
Hello ​Radha,

Greetings from PharmEasy!
​
I understand your concern related to the order #654763459244195840-56111. Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience caused.
​
However, we can take a returned request for the same.
​
Before raising a returned request, I would request you set the refund preference so that the refund is initiated into the payment source or else the refund will be credited to your PharmEasy wallet. 
​
You can set refund preferences in your App or on the website based on the Mode of Payment that you select for your orders.
​
Click on the link to set the refund preference:
https://pharmeasy.in/account/profile/refunds
 
Once you set the refund preference, you can connect back to us and we will take action accordingly.
​
Awaiting your response.
​
Regards,
Manisha

Hi pharmeasy team,

I have recently ordered 3 products from your app and one of the product was
delivered damaged. I opened the package and found the shampoo almost
spilled all over.

Order id : 654358952602738688
Order details: Scalpe plus shampoo(150ml)+Ahaglow face wash (200ml)+
epidural gel(30gms)
Damaged product: Scalpe plus shampoo(150ml); find the pictures attached as

shade the pictures make it hard to recognise the shampoo spillage, and the
shampoo bottle is also not full)
Order placed on: 1st Dec, 2025
Mobile number: 9949440999

The order was delivered with 2 days of delay and mentioned in app that I
asked for delay in delivery which I did not. I hope you can correct this
type of mistake in future.

Regards,
Tanuja.
